body_html:
Also, just to be clear, this patchset does already work on other distros than just Gentoo. The lib names and linker opts are standardized.

The only thing that does not work right now is searching a different prefix other than the base compiler paths (@msarahan's usecase). But a regular .deb or .rpm would work. That one is what is more complicated by bazel's rules. I'll fix those in a later series, either with new bazel or add things to ./configure.

I'd rather get this merged before the 1.10 branch happens so other distros can get started packaging this too.
